description: A rare ‘gigantic jet’ lightning was captured by an astronaut aboard the ISS on November 19, 2024. This massive bolt extended nearly 50 miles into the atmosphere, likely originating from a thunderstorm near New Orleans. The image, later discovered in NASA’s archives, highlights an unusual lightning event that travels upwards instead of striking the ground. Scientists estimate that around 1,000 such events occur annually, though most remain undetected.
title: Astronaut Captures Rare ‘Gigantic Jet’ Lightning Extending 50 Miles Above Earth

description: NASA tested its Compact Fire Infrared Radiance Spectral Tracker (c-FIRST) over California wildfires to improve real-time fire tracking. Managed by NASA’s Jet Propulsion Laboratory, the instrument captures high-resolution thermal infrared data, identifying temperature variations across wildfire-affected areas. Experts believe this could help firefighting agencies detect smoldering fires that might reignite. With further testing, c-FIRST could be used in future satellite missions to enhance global wildfire monitoring efforts.
title: NASA Tests Advanced Infrared Technology to Improve Wildfire Monitoring

description: A solar storm is expected to reach Earth tonight, potentially creating auroras visible as far south as New York and Idaho. The Space Weather Prediction Center (SWPC) of NOAA forecasts a G1-class geomagnetic storm, with a possibility of stronger G2 conditions. This may lead to disruptions in GPS and radio signals. The best time to witness the northern lights will be between 7:00 p.m. EST and 10:00 p.m. EST on March 4-5. Observers should head to dark areas for optimal visibility.
title: Solar Storm to Trigger Northern Lights in US: Visibility, Timing & Impact

description: A 125-million-year-old fossil of Jeholia longchengi, a newly identified scorpion species, has been unearthed in China’s Yixian Formation. Measuring around 10 cm, it is significantly larger than most Mesozoic scorpions. The discovery provides crucial insights into the Early Cretaceous food web, where it likely preyed on insects and small vertebrates. The fossil, exceptionally preserved in sediment rather than amber, is housed at the Fossil Valley Museum in Chaoyang, China.
title: 125-Million-Year-Old Scorpion Fossil Discovered in China, Shedding Light on Mesozoic-Era Predators

description: After a two-year wait, Akhil Akkineni’s spy thriller Agent is set to stream on Sony LIV from March 14, 2025. Directed by Surender Reddy, the film follows RAW agent Ricky, played by Akhil, as he faces off against a rogue ex-agent, portrayed by Dino Morea. Mammootty plays a key role in this high-octane action film. Initially released in April 2023, Agent struggled at the box office but now reaches a wider audience via OTT. It will stream in Telugu, Tamil, Malayalam, and Kannada.
title: Akhil Akkineni’s Agent Set for OTT Release on Sony LIV: Everything You Need to Know

description: All I See Is You, a psychological thriller starring Blake Lively and Jason Clarke, is set to stream on Lionsgate Play from March 7. Directed by Marc Forster, the film delves into a couple’s shifting dynamics when Gina, blind since childhood, regains her vision. As their marriage changes, unexpected psychological tensions emerge. The film, known for its visually unique storytelling, received mixed reviews but remains a compelling watch.
title: All I See Is You OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch Blake Lively Starrer Online?, Arrives on Lionsgate Play on March 7

description: The All India Consumer Products Distributors Federation (AICPDF), in a case filing with the Competition Commission of India, has asked for an investigation into many business practices of Zomato's Blinkit, Swiggy's instamart, and Zepto, including how discounts are doled out.
title: Fast-Delivery Companies Zomato, Swiggy, Zepto Face Antitrust Case Over Discounts

description: Finder Project 1, a Tamil-language suspense thriller, was released in 2024. Starring Charle and Sendrayan, the film is directed by Vinoth Rajendran and produced under Arabi Productions and Viyan Ventures. Shot in Chennai and Ramnad, the film features music by Surya Prasadh and cinematography by Baby Antony. It will be released on Aha Tamil on March 7.
title: Finder Project 1 OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: The James Webb Space Telescope has captured new insights into SIMP 0136, a planetary-mass object floating freely around 20 light-years away. This celestial body, possibly a rogue planet or a brown dwarf, has puzzled astronomers for years. JWST’s infrared observations have revealed intricate cloud layers, temperature shifts, and potential chemical variations in its atmosphere, offering unprecedented detail. These findings could reshape how such objects are classified and studied in the future.
title: James Webb Space Telescope Observes Mysterious Rogue Planet-Like Object

description: Microsoft unveiled two new artificial intelligence (AI) agents for enterprises on Wednesday. These agents are adept in various tasks in sales operations, and can assist professionals by automating time-consuming workloads. The company introduced these two AI agents in Microsoft 365 Copilot, and businesses can now access them and integrate them into their business data.
title: Microsoft Unveils Two AI Agents That Can Complete Sales Tasks for Enterprise Clients

description: A privately-led space mission is being developed to retrieve and analyse cloud samples from Venus. Scientists believe the planet’s sulfuric acid clouds might sustain organic molecules necessary for life. The mission, named Morning Star, involves deploying probes to collect mist from Venus' atmosphere. The collected samples would be returned to Earth using a specialised rocket. If successful, it would be the first privately-funded interplanetary mission. NASA and the European Space Agency are also planning Venus missions in the coming decade.
title: Private Venus Mission Plans to Retrieve Cloud Samples for Life Research

description: Reports indicate a sharp rise in marine heat waves, with 2023–2024 experiencing a 240% increase compared to past years. Scientists warn of devastating effects on marine life, including mass die-offs, coral reef degradation, and increased storm intensity. Coastal communities are at risk as extreme weather events linked to warming oceans become more frequent. Conservation efforts can help, but experts stress that reducing greenhouse gas emissions remains the only long-term solution to mitigate the crisis.
title: Scientists Warn of Alarming Rise in Marine Heat Waves and Its Impact on Oceans

description: Test, the upcoming Tamil film starring R Madhavan, Nayanthara, and Siddharth, will be available for streaming on Netflix from April 4, 2025. Directed by S. Sashikanth, the film follows three individuals whose lives are connected both on and off the cricket pitch, with choices that shape their futures. Produced under YNOT Studios, the film brings an emotional and intense sports drama to audiences. The trailer teases high-stakes moments and personal conflicts, making it a much-awaited release for Tamil cinema lovers.
title: Test OTT Release: R Madhavan, Nayanthara & Siddharth’s Tamil Film Arrives on Netflix This April

description: Taxes on cars imported into India are as high as 110 percent, which Tesla chief Elon Musk has criticised as being among the steepest in the world. The EV giant last year shelved its plans to enter the world's third-largest car market for a second time.
title: US Said to be Eyeing Zero Tariff on Cars in India Trade Deal as Tesla Entry Nears

description: Vietnam’s finance ministry is working to pilot a trading platform for digital assets by the end of March. The development comes just days after Vietnam’s Prime Minister Phạm Minh Chính set a national growth target of eight percent or more by the end of 2025.
title: Vietnam to Pilot Digital Assets Exchange Project in March

description: Astronomers have traced decades-old X-ray emissions from the Helix Nebula to a white dwarf possibly consuming planetary debris. Reports suggest a Jupiter-like planet may have been torn apart by the star’s intense gravitational forces. Data from NASA’s Chandra X-ray Observatory and ESA’s XMM-Newton indicate that remnants of the destroyed planet could be accreting onto the white dwarf’s surface, generating high-energy emissions. If confirmed, this would be the first recorded case of planetary destruction within a planetary nebula.
title: X-ray Signal from Helix Nebula Suggests Planet Was Destroyed by White Dwarf

description: CloudSEK has uncovered a large-scale fraud operation in India, dubbed 'PrintSteal', involving the creation of fake Know Your Customer (KYC) documents. The operation used fake domains mimicking government websites to generate over 1.67 lakh fake documents, earning more than Rs. 40 lakh. The scammers used personally identifiable information (PII) from unsuspecting customers' documents to create the fraudulent KYC documents.
title: CloudSEK Identifies Large-Scale 'PrintSteal' Fake KYC Document Generation Scam in India

description: iOS 18.4 Beta 2 update was released for iPhone to developers and testers on Monday. The update brings much-awaited visual intelligence features to compatible smartphones. But it also includes another artificial intelligence (AI) feature that will enable users to quickly understand the overall summary of apps and games in the App Store.
title: iOS 18.4 Beta 2 Update for iPhone Brings Apple Intelligence-Powered Review Summaries to App Store

description: OnePlus has issued a clarification around the update policy for its latest handsets, the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R. It has disregarded recent reports which suggested that while the handsets will come with an assured four years of operating system (OS) updates, the company counts Android 15-based OxygenOS 15, which they come with out-of-the-box, in the update cycle. Both the OnePlus 13 and OnePlus 13R are confirmed to receive OS updates up to Android 19.
title: OnePlus 13, OnePlus 13R Confirmed to Receive 4 Years of Android OS Updates

description: Oppo Enco Buds 3 Pro will be unveiled in Malaysia soon, however, the company has yet to announce the exact launch date of the TWS earphones. The design and key features of the headsets have been confirmed. They are equipped with 12.4mm dynamic drivers and are claimed to offer up to 54 hours of total battery life. The Enco Buds 3 Pro will have an IP55-rated build and support dual device connectivity.
title: Oppo Enco Buds 3 Pro to Launch Soon; Design, Key Features Confirmed

description: Redmi Note 14S may soon join the Redmi Note 14 series, which was launched in India in December 2024. The series included the Note 14, Note 14 Pro, and Note 14 Pro+. Ahead of any official details regarding the Note 14S variant, a report has surfaced online suggesting the expected price, design, colourways and key features of the handset.
title: Redmi Note 14S Price, Design, Colour Option, Key Specifications Surface Online

description: Dantewada’s district administration has partnered with Bengaluru-based Zupple Labs to migrate seven lakh land records to the Avalanche blockchain. This move aims to ensure permanent, tamper-proof records while enabling secure and authentic verification for authorities and residents.
title: Dantewada City Teams Up with Zupple Labs to Migrate 7 Lakh Land Records to Avalanche

description: Google Shopping, the company’s product discovery platform, is getting upgraded with several new artificial intelligence (AI) features. Announced on Wednesday, these new features will enable them to both find and experience new products before they make their purchasing decision. The new AI tools are aimed at the apparel and makeup categories, and the company said that they were built by bringing together Google’s AI models with the platform’s Shopping Graph.
title: Google Shopping Gets Upgraded With AI-Powered Features, Will Help Users Find the Right Clothes

description: Mivi SuperPods Concerto TWS earphones were launched in India on Thursday. They offer up to 35dB active noise cancellation (ANC) support and come with 3D soundstage technology. The earphones are claimed to offer a total usage time of up to 60 hours together with the case. The TWS earphones come with a Hi-Res Audio certification as well as support for Dolby Audio and LDAC audio codecs.
title: Mivi SuperPods Concerto TWS Earphones With Up to 60 Hours Total Battery Life Launched in India

description: Nothing Phone 3a series was launched on March 4 at the Mobile World Congress (MWC) in Barcelona comprising two models — Nothing Phone 3a Pro and the Phone 3a. Ahead of the commencement of its sales in India beginning March 11, Flipkart has announced a Guaranteed Exchange Value (GEV) programme which lets customers trade in their old smartphones for either the Nothing Phone 3a Pro or the Phone 3a and get the best value for their devices.
title: Nothing Phone 3a, Phone 3a Pro Get Guaranteed Exchange Value Offer on Flipkart

description: Named the ‘National Cryptocurrency Association’ (NCA), this non-profit will promote education and awareness of cryptocurrencies, blockchain, and Web3 in the US. Ripple has pledged $50 million (roughly Rs. 435 crore) to support its efforts.
title: Ripple Pledges $50 Million for ‘National Cryptocurrency Association’ in the US: All Details

description: Ballistic Moon, the studio behind the Until Dawn remake, has reportedly “effectively closed”. The UK-based developer was hit with layoffs in September 2024, weeks ahead of the remake launched. The remaining staff was reportedly let go without an announcement in December, leaving the studio with a “handful of employees”.
title: Until Dawn Remake Developer Ballistic Moon 'Effectively Closed' After Funding Troubles: Report

description: Acer will unveil new smartphones in India later this month. The company has not yet announced the exact models that will be launched, but a launch date has been revealed. A live Amazon microsite has confirmed that the upcoming phones will be available for purchase via the e-commerce site. Notably, Indkal Technologies announced last year that it will launch Acer-branded smartphones in India.
title: Acer to Launch New Smartphones in India on March 25; Amazon Availability Confirmed

description: Amazon Prime Video is testing a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature that will let users watch AI-generated dubbed content. Announced on Wednesday, the streaming platform said the pilot programme will allow viewers to watch titles that previously did not have dubbing available in select countries and regions. During the pilot run, the company will only offer a select number of movies and shows.
title: Amazon Prime Video Begins Testing AI-Aided Dubbing for Some Movies and Shows

description: Bengaluru-based startup Ultraviolette launched its new electric vehicles (EVs) in India on Wednesday. With the debut of Ultraviolette Tesseract, the company has forayed into the country's electric scooter market, taking on the likes of Ather Energy and Ola Electric. Alongside, the company also expanded its portfolio of electric bikes with the launch of the Ultraviolette Shockwave, which is an enduro bike.
title: Ultraviolette Tesseract Electric Scooter With 261 KM IDC Range Launched Alongside Shockwave Enduro Bike

description: Apple's first foldable iPhone could arrive next year with a book-style design with a 7.8-inch inner screen and a 5.5-inch cover display. It could launch after the iPhone 17 series, with a premium price tag. Analyst Ming-Chi Kuo predicts limited production of Apple's foldable iPhone until 2027, when Apple may launch a second-generation foldable smartphone.
title: Apple's Foldable iPhone Specifications, Price and AI Features Leaked: Here's When It Might Debut

description: Rose and Ohanian, who acquired Digg for an undisclosed sum, said on Wednesday they aim to revive the platform by leveraging their social media expertise, restoring its nostalgic early interface.
title: Digg to Make Comeback as Co-Founder Rose, Reddit's Ohanian Bet on AI-Driven Revival

description: Tesla has signed a lease deal to open its first showroom in Mumbai. The showroom will be situated in the Maker Maxity building in the business and retail hub of Bandra Kurla Complex near the city's airport, according to the papers.
title: Tesla Signs Deal for First India Showroom to Sell Imported EVs

description: The Last of Us Part 2 might not get a sequel, Naughty Dog president Neil Druckmann has suggested. According to him, there might not be more The Last of Us games, despite previously saying he had a concept for The Last of Us Part 3.
title: Naughty Dog May Not Work on The Last of Us Part 3, Neil Druckmann Suggests

description: Google Search received a new artificial intelligence (AI) feature dubbed AI Mode on Wednesday. The Mountain View-based tech giant was reportedly internally testing this feature last month, and has now rolled it out to a limited number of users. The AI Mode will offer responses on complex topics, and search queries that are multi-faceted and could take a user multiple searches to find the information.
title: Google Launches Gemini-Powered AI Mode for Search, Expands AI Overviews to More Users

description: OnePlus has issued a clarification regarding the software update policy for two of its smartwatches — the OnePlus Watch 3 and Watch 2. Mere hours after it was highlighted that the wearables would only come with two years of software updates, the company has elucidated that the prior information was wrong and its latest smartwatches will indeed offer three years of software updates, according to a report. Additionally, they will also be eligible to receive three years of quarterly security updates.
title: OnePlus Watch 3, Watch 2 to Receive 3 Years of Quarterly Security Updates: Report

description: Realme P3 Ultra may soon join the Realme P3 Pro 5G and the Realme P3x 5G handsets, which were introduced in India in February.  Although some details of the Ultra variant had leaked previously, the phone has now been spotted on a popular benchmarking site. The listing hints at the chipset, RAM and operating system of the purported smartphone. The handset could get a MediaTek Dimensity 8300 series SoC.
title: Realme P3 Ultra With MediaTek Dimensity 8300 Series SoC Spotted on Geekbench

description: Tecno Megabook S14 was unveiled at MWC 2025 in Barcelona as the company's first OLED display laptop. Powered by a 12-core Snapdragon X Elite chip with up to 32GB of RAM and 2TB SSD storage, Tecno claims it's the world's lightest 14-inch OLED laptop. An x86 variant with Intel Core Ultra chips is also available, compatible with Tecno's new external graphics dock equipped with an unspecified Nvidia graphics card.
title: Tecno Megabook S14 With Snapdragon X Elite, 14-Inch 2.8 OLED Display Launched at MWC 2025

description: Apple refreshed its Mac Studio with new chipset options on Wednesday (March 5). When buying the small-form-factor workstation, customers can choose between either the M4 Max or the newly launched M3 Ultra SoCs. The company says it is positioned above the Mac mini and is built for Apple Intelligence — its suite of artificial intelligence (AI) features. It is capable of running large language models (LLMs) with over 600 billion parameters. The desktop also gets improved connectivity options with the inclusion of Thunderbolt 5.
title: Apple Refreshes Mac Studio With M4 Max and M3 Ultra Chips and Apple Intelligence: Price, Specifications

description: A US judge has denied Elon Musk's request seeking to pause OpenAI's transition to a for-profit model. Musk does not have "the high burden required for a preliminary injunction" to block the conversion of OpenAI, said US District Judge Yvonne Gonzalez Rogers in Oakland, California.
title: Judge Denies Musk's Bid to Halt OpenAI's For-Profit Shift, Fast Tracks Trial

description: UK's Competition and Markets Authority said that the 2023 deal doesn’t qualify for a full investigation under merger rules. The decision, after around 14 months of scrutiny, removes one UK regulatory uncertainty for Microsoft, which faces a continued investigation into its cloud service offerings.
title: Microsoft’s $13 Billion OpenAI Tie-Up Cleared by UK's Competition and Markets Authority

description: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7's expected features and design elements have surfaced online recently. Previous leaks and reports have suggested that the phone may have a slightly larger cover display than its predecessor. However, a new report claims that the outer screen of the purported clamshell foldable will be considerably bigger. The design of the cover screen is also said to be different on the Galaxy Z Flip 7.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 Tipped to Get a Larger Cover Display; May Ditch the Folder-Type Design

description: YouTube on Wednesday (March 5) announced the launch of a new subscription plan which becomes the most affordable way to watch ad-free content on the video-streaming platform. Dubbed Premium Lite, its pilot has commenced which offers ad-free streaming of “most videos” on YouTube and is priced at $7.99 (roughly Rs. 695) per month. Currently limited to the US, YouTube says it will also be expanded to more regions over the coming weeks.
title: YouTube Launches Premium Lite Plan With Ad-Free Streaming of ‘Most’ Videos, No YouTube Music Subscription

description: A US judge has denied Elon Musk's request seeking to pause OpenAI's transition to a for-profit model. Musk does not have "the high burden required for a preliminary injunction" to block the conversion of OpenAI, said US District Judge Yvonne Gonzalez Rogers in Oakland, California.
title: UK Says Microsoft-OpenAI Partnership Does Not Need Antitrust Investigation
